title: Crypto Payments Firm Wyre Shuts Down — Users Told to Remove Assets From Platform
description: Wyre, the San Francisco-based crypto payments firm, has said it is winding down operations “in order to protect the best interests” of its users and stakeholders. The firm urged users with assets on its platform “to continue to withdraw them via Wyre’s dashboard until Friday, July 14th.” A statement released by the firm said parties […]

title: Billionaire Chamath Palihapitiya Predicts Sticky Inflation and High Interest Rates for Rest of the Decade – Here’s Why
description:
